name: Polar Escape (Demo)
description:
Made for the MoonJam 2020, hosted by MoonMoon on Twitch.

Polar Escape is a fast paced and energetic runner game where you play as Flipps the penguin, running through the polar bear ice cave.  Flipps’ adventure is not going to be easy, however, as the polar bear cave has always been known for danger.  Whether it’s ice spikes, a sudden pit or turn, or the ferocious growl that all penguins know, Flipps path to survival is unclear.  Grab as many fish as you can to save Flipps’ family!
